name: Beyond Survival
overview: Beyond Survival is a Canadian documentary television show hosted by survival expert Les Stroud.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Watch Les Stroud experience first hand, out of the ordinary practices that have helped cultures survive for thousands of years. It is the ultimate mind, body and spiritual adventure for the world's ultimate adventurer!

episodes.name: The Devil Dancers of Sri Lanka
episodes.overview: On a journey to Sri Lanka, Stroud lives alongside men once believed to be half-human/half-demon and exorcises dark forces in a rarely seen ritual.

episodes.name: The Sea Gypsies of Malaysia
episodes.overview: Les heads into open waters with the Sea Gypsies of Malaysia to spearfish in shark filled seas, and survive in a world of water, where storms and tsunamis threaten to wipe out the tribe, forever.

episodes.name: The San - Bushmen of the Kalahari
episodes.overview: Les Stroud treks deep into the Kalahari Desert to learn from the original masters of survival, the San Bushmen, a unique tribe believed to be the closest living descendants of the first humans.

episodes.name: The Hewa of Papua New Guinea
The Inuit - Survivors Of The Future
Peru - The Huacharia of the Amazon
The Zulu of South Africa
episodes.overview: Les travels to South Africa to join the Zulu, one of the most legendary tribes in Africa and among the world's greatest masters of survival. In Zululand, Les meets with a female African Shaman, or Sangoma, to experience the rite of passage known as scarification. He'll also learn the Zulu methods of traditional hunting, and take part in the deadly sport of stick fighting.

episodes.name: The Q'Ero - Descendants Of The Incan High Priests
The Mentawai Shamans Of Indonesia
episodes.overview: Survivorman Les Stroud journeys to the remote jungles of Borneo to learn the secrets of the Mentawai, and survive in an extreme environment where almost every form of life can kill, and even caterpillars pack a deadly bite.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Watch Les Stroud experience first hand, out of the ordinary practices that have helped cultures survive for thousands of years. It is the ultimate mind, body and spiritual adventure for the world's ultimate adventurer!
